arts.sum: As Bologna and Torino gear up for their upcoming Serie A encounter, both teams are dealing with a mix of returning players and ongoing absences. The post Serie A | Bologna v Torino: Probable starting lineups appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Bologna vs. Torino to get matchday 25 underway
arts.sum: Bologna haven’t conceded goal in their last three Serie A games against Torino and have never kept more clean sheets in a row against the Granata; the last time the Rossoblu recorded more consecutive clean sheets against a single opponent in the competition was in April 2016 against Genoa (five). Santiago Castro (20 years and 149 days on the day of the match and with six goals currently) could become the second youngest foreign player in the history of Bologna to score seven goals in a Serie A season, after Harald Nielsen in 1962.

arts.ttl: Torino’s Vanoli: “Ilic is Back but Negotiations are Still Open”
